faq.title: Common Questions from Event Organizers
faq.q1: Will this disrupt my current registration process?
faq.a1: Not at all! We integrate seamlessly with your existing Google Form. Your participants continue registering exactly as they do now‚Äîyou just get powerful new insights.
faq.q2: How quickly can I start seeing live registrations?
faq.a2: Most clients have their dashboard live within 24-48 hours after sharing their Google Form link.
faq.q3: Do I need technical skills to use this?
faq.a3: None whatsoever! We handle all the technical setup. You just share your form link and start monitoring registrations.
